message: Let's start fair. I'll take most, but you get a decent share. We can always negotiate later.

Hi Alice, I know we both want to settle this quickly. Since every additional round costs me value (20% less per round), I’m proposing a division where you get $8000 and I get $2000. I hope you see the benefit of reaching an agreement now rather than waiting further. Let’s close this deal swiftly!
